pageContent: Background: High-intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU) is an alternative technique in the treatment of prostate cancer (PC). Despite proven oncologic efficacy, HIFU is still not establish as a standard therapy for PC in Germany due to insufficient clinical studies.

metaData.source:
[Treatment of prostate cancer using high-intensity focused ultrasound, literature review]
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/34726617/
